solution_line_template: Jack took {jack_extra} more candies than the half, and Paul took the rest, which means {paul_took} + {jack_extra} = {half_candies} candies were half of all candies.
That means at first there were {half_candies} * {multiplier_for_half} = <<{half_candies}*{multiplier_for_half}={total_candies}>>{total_candies} candies.
